name: ola
description: Smooth animation library for inbetweening numbers in Javascript

scripts.build: rollup ola.js --name Ola --output.format umd | uglifyjs -o ola.min.js
scripts.size: echo "$(gzip -c ola.min.js | wc -c) bytes" # Only for Unix

author: Francisco Presencia <public@francisco.io> (https://francisco.io/)
